Economic solutions
for your business

Get Started Our Projects Academy

We develop economic analysis tools

Using our expertise in economics and statistics we build tools to assist and automate your business decisions.

  • We stand out by incorporating the frontier research.
  • We open the source code for most of our products.
  • We provide an exclusive support for our clients.
  • We offer tailored products upon request.

Products & Services

We offer our existing products under various licenses, and also build new ones exclusively for interested clients. We offer various support services for our tools including maintenance, troubleshooting, customizing and training. We also provide economic and statistical consulting services.

Corporate Valuation

We perform customer-based corporate valuation using our in-house developed software framework based on the very recent research by McCarthy, Fader and Hardie (2016).

Economic Impact Analysis

We are developing an automated EIA framework which will calculate and demonstrate the economic effects of opening your business or passing a regulation to the local environment.

Economic Simulations

We simulate artificial economies using agent-based modeling. Particularly, we have developed a cryptoeconomic framework, which we use to analyze crypto-tokens.

Statistical Consulting

We build statistical methods and libraries, tailored for our clients, and help with experimental design.

Clients

We have worked with various companies and contributed to many projects. We routinely share our developed packages with the open source community. Some of our partners and clients are listed below.
